name: Color Stack 3D
description:
Reach the tower bottom by crushing the stack helix using a ball crusher in a 3d game experience.
Don’t crush your splashy ball Color.

1. Easy to play hard to master.
2.tHarder than you think.
3. Hold, smash, bounce, the ball crush different helix stacks.
4. Get all levels done.
5.Best time killer game on mobile.

Thanks for playing Color Stack 3D
